author: MENA
title: Sisi: History to highlight Egyptians' miracle of defending homeland against terrorism
text:
President Abdel Fattah al-Sisi Saturday 09/03/2024 said that the magnificent miracle achieved by the Egyptians over the past years shall forever resonate in history, bearing witness to their defense of their ancient homeland against falling in the perils of terrorism and the groups of evil and extremism.
They defied the hurricane of fragmentation, collapse and chaos that swept through all parts of the region, in which we live, the president said while addressing the 39th Armed Forces Cultural Symposium on the occasion of the the Armed Forces’ celebration of the Martyr and Veteran’s Day, which took place at Al Manara International Conference Center in New Cairo earlier in the day.
“At the very same time, they built and developed their country and laid a foundation for a national economy, capable of persevering through crises. By God’s grace, it will not be long before the Egyptians celebrate the fruits of their dedication, patience and investments in building the future of this homeland,” he president said.
“Today, I speak to you on the anniversary of “Martyr’s Day”; the day of the heroes, who rose from the soil of this blessed land. They upheld their duty with unwavering pride and found peace in the embrace of the divine, leaving us with the sorrow of separation, yet an endless legacy of pride and glory that will be enshrined in our nation’s memory.
“The radiant chapters of our nation’s history are filled with countless days that stand as testaments to the Egyptian people’s struggle; a story of sacrifices and heroism that have illuminated torches of light, ignited the flames of patriotism, shattered the rocks of despair, paved the paths of hope and immortalized their names in the records of honor.
“A salutation of appreciation and respect from the great people of Egypt to the brave men of the Armed Forces, who bear the responsibility, with all resolve, perseverance and courage, for the protection of the homeland’s resources and gains, side by side with the robust policemen, dedicated to safeguarding Egypt’s security, all armed with their loyalty to this great homeland.
“Over the past months, the world has been witnessing a devastating tragedy adjacent to us, in dear Palestine. Thousands were martyred in the Gaza Strip, leaving survivors to grapple with an unprecedented humanitarian catastrophe. We have been exerting our utmost efforts and energy to protect them and provide relief by striving for a ceasefire and delivering assistance to them.
“Today, we send the entire Palestinian people, who are steadfast on their land and resilient on their soil, a salute of appreciation and admiration. We tell them: “Your pain is our pain, and your suffering is our suffering. Egypt is committed to pursuing efforts toward reaching a ceasefire, delivering aid, and providing relief to those affected by this massive disaster. Unwavering in its support, Egypt will tirelessly work, no matter the cost, toward securing the brotherly Palestinian people’s legitimate rights in their independent state.”
“Concluding my speech, I would like to extend a special greeting to the families of our martyrs, to the grieving father and mother, to the patient wife, and to the steadfast son and daughter, to all of you I extend my as well as the Egyptian people’s greetings and appreciation for your great sacrifices. We vow to uphold our sacred duty to you, as Egypt unites as your family and your martyrs, our sons, are forever enshrined as icons of pride and sources of dignity.”

author: Uneeb Khan
title: Explore the Top SimpliSafe Indoor Camera Reviews for Enhanced Home Security - Businessfig
text: In an era marked by technological advancements, the quest for securing our homes and businesses has led to the evolution of surveillance systems. Security cameras, a vital component of any comprehensive security strategy, come in various forms, with CCTV (Closed-Circuit Television) and wireless options being among the most popular. In this comprehensive guide, we’ll delve into the debate of CCTV wireless security cameras, exploring their key features, specifications, and helping you make an informed decision about which one suits your needs best. Understanding CCTV (Closed-Circuit Television) While traditional CCTV systems have long been a mainstay in the security industry, modern solutions like the [Best SimpliSafe Indoor Camera](https://www.arsalpro.com/best-simplisafe-indoor-camera-reviews) reviews are gaining prominence. These advanced systems offer wireless connectivity, high-resolution feeds, and smart features, providing a new dimension to home security. However, the reliability of CCTV remains unparalleled, making it a steadfast choice in critical environments like banks, government facilities, and industrial complexes. Key Features of CCTV Security Cameras: - Reliability: Wired connections make CCTV systems highly reliable, ensuring uninterrupted surveillance. - Stability: Immune to wireless interference, CCTV cameras provide a stable and consistent video feed. - Customization: Easy to scale and customize, allowing for the addition of more cameras and features as needed. - Durability: Wired connections are less susceptible to environmental factors, enhancing the durability of CCTV systems. - Security: With a closed system, the risk of hacking or unauthorized access is significantly reduced. Understanding Wireless Security Cameras Wireless security cameras, on the other hand, have gained popularity for their flexibility and ease of installation. These cameras utilize Wi-Fi or other wireless technologies to transmit video signals, eliminating the need for extensive cabling. This makes them a popular choice for residential areas, small businesses, and locations where running cables may be challenging or impractical. Key Features of Wireless Security Cameras: - Flexibility: Wireless cameras are easy to install and relocate, providing flexibility in choosing surveillance locations. - Cost-Effective Installation: No need for extensive cabling reduces installation costs, making wireless systems more budget-friendly. - Remote Access: Many wireless cameras offer remote monitoring capabilities, allowing users to view footage from anywhere with an internet connection. - Scalability: Wireless systems can be easily expanded without the need for additional cabling, making them scalable to evolving security needs. - Quick Deployment: Ideal for temporary surveillance needs or events, wireless cameras can be quickly deployed and dismantled [.](https://businessfig.com/) CCTV vs. Wireless: A Comparative Analysis Now, let’s delve into a side-by-side comparison of CCTV and wireless security cameras based on essential factors: |Features||CCTV Security Cameras||Wireless Security Cameras| |Reliability||Highly reliable with stable wired connections.||Dependent on the strength and stability of Wi-Fi.| |Installation||Requires cabling, potentially more complex.||Simple installation without the need for cables.| |Flexibility||Less flexible due to wired connections.||Highly flexible with easy relocation options.| |Cost||Initial installation costs may be higher.||Generally more cost-effective in installation.| |Scalability||Scalable but may require additional cabling.||Easily scalable without the need for cabling.| |Remote Access||Limited without additional network configurations.||Remote access is a standard feature.| |Durability||More durable in harsh environmental conditions.||Susceptible to environmental factors.| Choosing the Right Security Camera The choice between CCTV and wireless security cameras, including those highlighted in [Best SimpliSafe Indoor Camera ](https://www.arsalpro.com/best-simplisafe-indoor-camera-reviews)reviews, hinges on individual requirements, budget considerations, and the intended application. In scenarios where steadfast reliability is crucial, especially in high-security zones, CCTV systems remain a favored option. On the other hand, for situations that demand flexibility, rapid deployment, and cost-effectiveness, wireless security cameras, with insights from comprehensive reviews, emerge as a compelling solution. It’s worth noting that hybrid solutions combining both wired and wireless technologies are also available, providing the best of both worlds. These systems leverage the stability of CCTV where needed while incorporating the flexibility of wireless cameras in other areas. In Conclusion In the ever-evolving landscape of security technology, the choice between CCTV and wireless security cameras is not a one-size-fits-all decision. Each type has its unique set of advantages and considerations, catering to different requirements and scenarios. As you embark on the journey of fortifying your premises, carefully evaluate your priorities, weigh the pros and cons, and choose the security camera system that aligns best with your needs.

author: @shanghaiist
title: Ethereum Forecast: Three Signs Point to Potential $10,000 Valuation by 2024
text: - Ethereum (ETH) experienced a rally of nearly 90% in 2023, while competing altcoins like Solana (SOL) and Avalanche (AVAX) surged approximately 1000% and 200%, respectively. Speculation suggests ETH could reach $10,000 in 2024, potentially outperforming other cryptocurrencies. - Analysts predict a bull market in 2024, potentially driven by the SEC’s approval of a spot Bitcoin ETF and Bitcoin’s halving event in April, which may lead to a market surge similar to 2021. This environment could contribute to ETH hitting new highs, especially if Bitcoin also reaches a new peak. - Factors such as the prospect of an ETH ETF, with BlackRock showing interest and the SEC’s recognition of ETH as a commodity, and Ethereum’s overdue rally compared to other altcoins, might contribute to its rise. Additionally, Ethereum’s dominance in applications and adoption could be instrumental in its price surge to $10,000. While Ethereum (ETH) saw a modest rally in 2023, the cryptocurrency’s performance was eclipsed by the likes of Solana (SOL) and Avalanche (AVAX), which saw much larger gains. However, there’s speculation that Ethereum could experience a significant upturn in 2024, possibly reaching the $10,000 mark. Potential Catalysts for Ethereum’s Growth - A general bull market for cryptocurrencies, potentially spurred by regulatory changes and Bitcoin’s halving event. - The approval of an Ethereum ETF, with entities such as BlackRock showing interest and the SEC recognizing ETH as a commodity. - A delayed rally for Ethereum, especially as it has been relatively calm compared to other altcoins. - Ethereum’s strong position in terms of network use, application, and adoption, setting the stage for future price increases. Key Drivers for a Bullish Ethereum - Macro Crypto Market Trend: A new crypto bull market anticipated in 2024, possibly ignited by the SEC’s approval of a Bitcoin ETF and BTC’s halving event in April, could lead to a surge in ETH prices alongside a potential new high for BTC. - Ethereum ETF Prospects: With BlackRock’s interest and the SEC’s classification of ETH as a commodity, an Ethereum ETF might be nearing reality, contributing to a price increase. - Ethereum’s Overdue Rally: Given the massive rallies of other altcoins in late 2023, Ethereum’s relatively stable price suggests it might be poised for a significant uptick. - Ethereum’s Dominant Network Usage: As one of the most utilized blockchain networks with widespread application and adoption, Ethereum’s fundamental strength could be a decisive factor in its path to $10,000.

author: @wtaptelevision
title: Williamstown is prepared for the colder temperatures
text: Williamstown is prepared for the colder temperatures WILLIAMSTOWN, [W.Va](http://w.va/). (WTAP) - As we are experiencing colder temperatures right now and the possibility of snow, we spoke to Williamstown Mayor Paul Jordan III to see what the city has planned. Mayor Jordan expresses how the city is ready for anything mother nature brings as the cold weather sets in. “Well every year we have to plan ahead so it is kind of a summer time deal or a fall deal to where we are planning in salt and sand and working with our stock piles to make sure. The last few years have been generous to us because we haven’t had a lot of snowfall, so we are really prepared up in Williamstown right now and we have a good stock pile so we are prepared for anything that mother nature can give us.” said Paul Jordan III, Williamstown Mayor. It’s good to remember most places are going to be slick even if they don’t look it and it is always encouraged to check up on your neighbors. “There’s always the worry things that don’t look slick, are slick. You come out and what happens during the night the water runs in different ways and then the next thing you know you are out on the sidewalk and it’s slick. I always try to encourage to check in on your neighbors and to watch out. If they are unable to get their sidewalks clear then maybe help them or get someone to help them. We always want to be available at the city building if someone is in need we will try to find somebody to help them and work with clearing their driveways and make sure it is as safe as possible.” said Jordan. When traveling you should always be prepared in case of an emergency. “You should always have an emergency preparedness kit in your car. Blankets, flashlights, different types of things like that. With today’s world and cell phones in our area you pretty much have cell service everywhere, but if you are traveling or going across the state you would want to have some water and different things to back yourself up to make sure if you are stuck in that car for a period of time you have those items with you.” said Jordan. It is important to check up on your neighbors during the colder months to make sure they are okay. If you have any concerns Mayor Jordan encourages you to reach out to him or the city. Copyright 2024 WTAP. All rights reserved.

author: Laura McMillan
title: Wichita mother pleads guilty to killing her son
text:
by: Laura McMillan
Posted: Jun 13, 2024 / 04:32 PM CDT
Updated: Jun 13, 2024 / 04:32 PM CDT
Kylee R. Hodges appears before a judge on Feb. 13, 2024. (KSN News Photo) by: Laura McMillan
Posted: Jun 13, 2024 / 04:32 PM CDT
Updated: Jun 13, 2024 / 04:32 PM CDT
SHARE
WICHITA, Kan. (KSNW) — On Thursday morning, Kylee Hodges pleaded guilty to first-degree murder in the death of her 14-year-old son. The victim, Claude Hodges Jr., was found after police shot the mother to end a standoff at her apartment complex.
Claude Hodges Jr. (Courtesy Hodges family) Police went to the Hodges’ apartment in west Wichita on Jan. 28 to check on the son’s safety . The child’s parents were no longer together and shared custody, 50-50, according to Claude Hodges Sr.
Wichita warns mandatory water restrictions are coming ‘pretty quickly’ According to the Wichita Police Department, the mother allegedly met officers with a gun, and a standoff began. It ended early on Jan. 29 with SWAT officers shooting the mother and finding the son’s body in a bedroom. He had been shot.
The mother was rushed to the hospital for surgery. When she was released, she was charged with her son’s murder.
In May, the court found Kylee competent to stand trial.
Kylee was scheduled for a preliminary hearing next week, but she chose to plead to the murder charge instead. Sentencing is tentatively scheduled for July.
